name: RocketBall (itch)
description:
A local multiplayer game for 2-6 players that I built in 2 weeks for a game jam.  (Requires controllers. Have only tested with Xbox360 and Xbox One controllers)

Fly around firing rockets at the ball to outscore the other team and protect your own goal. Shoot your opponents to temporarily disable their ship and gain the advantage!

Select teams and configure your game with multiple options to experiment with, or start by just trying the defaults. Then jump in and start blasting! Hope you have some fun. 

I'm still iterating on this early prototype so any and all feedback is absolutely appreciated and will help me improve the game.

You can leave feedback here in the form of comments, a post on the discussion board,  or email me directly @ 87neiledwards@gmail.com

The controls can be viewed from the Pause Menu (Start Button) once in a match.

Left Stick - Move

Right Stick - Aim

Right Bumper - Fire (Press to aim. Release to Shoot)

Left Bumper - Dash

Right Trigger - Reload (Hold)

(Windows build with working input just went up. Next will be networked multiplayer)
